course_description: Provides an in-depth knowledge of the Japanese language in relation to culture and society, focusing on Japanese modes of thinking that lie behind language usage. Taught in English.
prerequisites: JPN 201 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1594, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: M. Mazzotta, Status: Open
